question: The 13th edition of Indian Premier League (IPL) has commenced in which country?
explanation:
The 13th edition of Indian Premier League (IPL) has commenced at Abu Dhabi in the United Arab Emirates.
Rohit Sharma led Mumbai Indians will take on M.S Dhoni led Chennai Super Kings in the opening match of the IPL. Due to the Covid-19 crisis, the tournament has been shifted to the Gulf country and will be held in three venues: Abu Dhabi, Sharjah and Dubai. It will be a complete TV- only event.
